badges.name: ChatBadge
badges.description: Awarded when a player sends a chat message

badges.name: ClickBadge
badges.description: Awarded when a player clicks something

badges.name: DailyLoginBadge
badges.description: Awarded for logging in on multiple days

badges.name: FriendsJoinedBadge
badges.description: Awarded when a friend joins the server

badges.name: GamepassBadge
badges.description: Awarded for owning a specific gamepass

badges.name: KillsBadge
badges.description: Awarded when a player gets enough kills

badges.name: LevelsBadge
badges.description: Awarded when a player reaches a certain level

badges.name: PartBadge
badges.description: Awarded when touching a defined part

badges.name: TimeBadge
badges.description: Awarded after playing for a certain time

badges.name: WelcomeBadge
badges.description: Awarded when a player joins the game
